Name: Unionatic
About the game: Unionatic is a real-time strategy game that deals with the ancient warfare of humans and creatures. * Build your village. * Manage your village. * Build your alliance. * Manage your guild. * Defeat the creatures. It has a structure where you can defend and attack against creatures of different races from the ancient forest in the Unionatic world, and also hold the administration of your own village. While building your own village in the game, you have to defend yourself against the creatures that will come from different places. You can fight shoulder to shoulder with your armies by switching to tps mode in the game or you can manage your armies with a camera angle from above.
